alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 02 at 9:36AM PST until February 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph possible. 2 to 4 foot waves for area lakes also possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu, Fort Mohave and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Laughlin and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Through 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts could lead to damage to some trees and power lines resulting in power outages. Isolated structural damage may also result. High wave action on area lakes resulting in very dangerous, potentially life threatening boating conditions. Areas of blowing dust may also result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to peak during the afternoon today, but strong winds gusts could linger through Thursday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
